MAPPING.DESCRIPTION: This Mapping is to update fcst_demand_product records for std_cost and wholesale_price
MAPPING.NAME: m_FCST_DMD_PROD_UPDATE

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: TIHS LOOK UP IS TO GET DATA FOR HISTORICAL PRICE COST FOR UNMAPPED INVTY
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: LKP_UNMAPPED_FCST_SBU_SG_INVTYCG

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup Sql Override
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT RCRD_TYPE AS RCRD_TYPE, BUSINESS_SEG_HIERARCHY_ID AS BUSINESS_SEG_HIERARCHY_ID, STYLE_GROUP AS STYLE_GROUP, CURRENCY AS CURRENCY , currency||NVL(AMOUNT,0) AS AMOUNT FROM HSF_BATCH.FCST_SBU_SG_INVTYCG_PRICE_COST WHERE level_of_aggregation='STYLE_GROUP' and uom ='REGULAR'

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup condition
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: RCRD_TYPE = I_RCRD_TYPE AND BUSINESS_SEG_HIERARCHY_ID = I_BUSINESS_SEG_HRCY_ID AND STYLE_GROUP = I_STYLE_GRP AND CURRENCY = I_CURRENCY

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: THIS EXPRESSION IS TO GET THE RECORDS FOR UPDATES
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: EXP_FCST_DMD_PROD

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: IIF(WHOLESALE_PRICE<>0,WHOLESALE_PRICE, IIF(CURRENT_PRICE <>0 AND CURRENT_PRICE_CURRENCY=CURRENCY_CODE,CURRENT_PRICE, IIF(FUTURE_PRICE<>0 AND FUTURE_PRICE_CURRENCY=CURRENCY_CODE,FUTURE_PRICE, IIF(V_HIST_PR<>0 AND V_HIST_PR_CURRENCY=CURRENCY_CODE,V_HIST_PR,0))))
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: V_Adjusted_WHOLESALE_PRICE

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: IIF((CURRENT_PRICE <>0 AND CURRENT_PRICE_CURRENCY<> CURRENCY_CODE) OR ( FUTURE_PRICE <>0 AND FUTURE_PRICE_CURRENCY <>CURRENCY_CODE) OR ( V_HIST_PR<> 0 AND V_HIST_PR_CURRENCY<>CURRENCY_CODE) , '*','')
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: V_PRICE_FLAG

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION:
IIF( WHOLESALE_PRICE <>0, NULL, IIF(CURRENT_PRICE <>0 AND CURRENT_PRICE_CURRENCY= CURRENCY_CODE, 'SAP Future Price - active', IIF( FUTURE_PRICE <>0 AND FUTURE_PRICE_CURRENCY =CURRENCY_CODE, 'SAP Future Price - future'||V_PRICE_FLAG, IIF( V_HIST_PR<> 0 AND NOT ISNULL(V_LKP_PRICE_INVTY_CAP_GRP) AND V_HIST_PR_CURRENCY=CURRENCY_CODE, 'SAMBA Historical Price Avg - SG/InvCap Lvl' || V_PRICE_FLAG, IIF( V_HIST_PR<> 0 AND NOT ISNULL(V_LKP_PRICE_STYLE_GRP) AND V_HIST_PR_CURRENCY=CURRENCY_CODE, 'SAMBA Historical Price Avg - SG Lvl' || V_PRICE_FLAG, 'Not Adjustable '|| V_PRICE_FLAG)))))
--IIF( WHOLESALE_PRICE<>0, NULL, --IIF(CURRENT_PRICE <>0 AND CURRENT_PRICE_CURRENCY= CURRENCY_CODE, 'SAP Future Price - active', --IIF( FUTURE_PRICE <>0 AND FUTURE_PRICE_CURRENCY =CURRENCY_CODE, 'SAP Future Price - future'||V_PRICE_FLAG, --IIF( V_HIST_PR<> 0 AND V_HIST_PR_CURRENCY=CURRENCY_CODE, 'SAMBA Historical Price Avg' || V_PRICE_FLAG, 'Not Adjustable '|| V_PRICE_FLAG))))
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: O_MISSING_DATA_CAL_PRICE

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: IIF(STD_COST<>0,STD_COST, IIF(CURRENT_COST<>0 AND CURRENT_COST_CURRENCY=CURRENCY_CODE,CURRENT_COST, IIF(FUTURE_COST<>0 AND FUTURE_COST_CURRENCY=CURRENCY_CODE,FUTURE_COST, IIF(V_HIST_CS<> 0 AND V_HIST_COST_CURRENCY=CURRENCY_CODE ,V_HIST_CS ,0))))
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: V_Adjusted_STD_COST

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: IIF ((CURRENT_COST <> 0 AND CURRENT_COST_CURRENCY<>CURRENCY_CODE) or ( FUTURE_COST <>0 AND FUTURE_COST_CURRENCY<>CURRENCY_CODE) or (V_HIST_CS <>0 AND V_HIST_COST_CURRENCY<>CURRENCY_CODE), '*', '')
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: V_FLAG_COST

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: IIF( STD_COST <> 0, NULL, IIF (CURRENT_COST <> 0 AND CURRENT_COST_CURRENCY=CURRENCY_CODE, 'SAP Future Cost - active', IIF( FUTURE_COST <>0 AND FUTURE_COST_CURRENCY=CURRENCY_CODE, 'SAP Future Cost - future'||V_FLAG_COST, IIF(V_HIST_CS <>0 AND NOT ISNULL(V_LKP_COST_INVTY_CAP_GRP) AND V_HIST_COST_CURRENCY=CURRENCY_CODE, 'SAMBA Historical Cost Avg - SG/InvCap Lvl'||V_FLAG_COST, IIF(V_HIST_CS <>0 AND NOT ISNULL(V_LKP_COST_STYLE_GRP) AND V_HIST_COST_CURRENCY=CURRENCY_CODE, 'SAMBA Historical Cost Avg - SG Lvl'||V_FLAG_COST, 'Not Adjustable'||V_FLAG_COST)))))
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: O_MISSING_DATA_CAL_COST

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: THIS TRANSFORMATION TO UPDATE THE EXISITNG RECORDS
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: UPD_FCST_DMD_PROD

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Get the exchange_rate_multiplier from join peg_rate P to FCST_DEMAND_PRODUCT dp on (P.Currency = dp.currency_code)
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: LKP_PEG_RATE

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup Sql Override
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT Peg_Rate.PegRate as PegRate, Peg_Rate.Currency as Currency FROM Peg_Rate with(nolock)

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: SOURCE QUALIFER TO FETCH FCST_DEMAND_PRODUCT DATA FOR UPDATE
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: SQ_FCST_DEMAND_PRODUCT

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT FDP.FCST_SKU_KEY, FDP.BUSINESS_SEG_HIERARCHY_ID, NVL(FDP.WHOLESALE_PRICE,0) AS WHOLESALE_PRICE, NVL(FDP.STD_COST,0) AS STD_COST, FDP.STYLE_GROUP, upper(FDP.INVTY_CAP_GROUP) as INVTY_CAP_GROUP, NVL(vw.current_price,0) AS CURRENT_PRICE , NVL(vw.future_price,0) AS FUTURE_PRICE, NVL(vw.current_cost,0) AS CURRENT_COST, NVL(vw.future_cost,0) AS FUTURE_COST, FDP.CURRENCY_CODE, VW.CURRENT_PRICE_CURRENCY, VW.FUTURE_PRICE_CURRENCY, VW.CURRENT_COST_CURRENCY, VW.FUTURE_COST_CURRENCY, FDP.GARM_PER_PKG_QTY, FDP.FREE_GOODS_QTY FROM FCST_DEMAND_PRODUCT FDP LEFT OUTER JOIN HSF_BATCH.VW_FCST_FUTURE_P_C_PIVOT VW ON (FDP.FCST_SKU_KEY= vw.fcst_sku_key AND FDP.BUSINESS_SEG_HIERARCHY_ID= VW.BUSINESS_SEG_HIERARCHY_ID) WHERE (NVL(FDP.WHOLESALE_PRICE,0) =0 OR NVL(FDP.STD_COST,0)=0)

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: TIHS LOOK UP IS TO GET DATA FOR HISTORICAL PRICE COST
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: LKP_FCST_SBU_SG_INVTYCG_PR_COST

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup Sql Override
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT RCRD_TYPE AS RCRD_TYPE, BUSINESS_SEG_HIERARCHY_ID AS BUSINESS_SEG_HIERARCHY_ID, STYLE_GROUP AS STYLE_GROUP, upper(INVTY_CAP_GROUP) AS INVTY_CAP_GROUP, CURRENCY AS CURRENCY , currency||NVL(AMOUNT,0) AS AMOUNT FROM HSF_BATCH.FCST_SBU_SG_INVTYCG_PRICE_COST WHERE level_of_aggregation='INVTY_CAP_GROUP' AND invty_cap_group <>'UNMAPPED' and UOM='REGULAR'

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup condition
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: RCRD_TYPE = I_RCRD_TYPE AND BUSINESS_SEG_HIERARCHY_ID = I_BUSINESS_SEG_HRCY_ID AND STYLE_GROUP = I_STYLE_GRP AND INVTY_CAP_GROUP = I_INVTY_CAP_GRP AND CURRENCY = I_CURRENCY

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: TIHS LOOK UP IS TO GET DATA FOR HISTORICAL PRICE COST FOR UNMAPPED INVTY
INSTANCE.NAME: LKP_UNMAPPED_FCST_SBU_SG_INVTYCG

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: THIS EXPRESSION IS TO GET THE RECORDS FOR UPDATES
INSTANCE.NAME: EXP_FCST_DMD_PROD

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Get the exchange_rate_multiplier from join peg_rate P to FCST_DEMAND_PRODUCT dp on (P.Currency = dp.currency_code)
INSTANCE.NAME: LKP_PEG_RATE

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: SOURCE QUALIFER TO FETCH FCST_DEMAND_PRODUCT DATA FOR UPDATE
INSTANCE.NAME: SQ_FCST_DEMAND_PRODUCT

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: TIHS LOOK UP IS TO GET DATA FOR HISTORICAL PRICE COST
INSTANCE.NAME: LKP_FCST_SBU_SG_INVTYCG_PR_COST
